body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Blue Motors customer support. My name is Johnny Cooper.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Patricia Diaz.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Patricia. If you don't mind, could you provide me with your phone number so I can assist you better?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five five five one two three four.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you. And may I also have your email address for our records?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my email is p.diaz@email.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Great, thank you for sharing that information with me, Patricia. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I had a question about pricing, but I feel relieved now. Thank you for your help.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: You're welcome, Patricia. If you have any more questions in the future, feel free to reach out. Thank you for contacting us. Have a wonderful day!
